description:
Grant is a straight 30-year-old muscle stud with an impressive set of low-hanging nuts, the likes of which I haven't seen since Seth!

Grant is your typical strong, silent type. Very polite but kind of shy, it was difficult to get him to open up at first. So, I used the camera to study every inch of his impressive physique, complimenting him all the way. A quick workout in the weight room got his muscles pumped and veins bulging. He hadn't had sex in about a week, so he was eager to unload himself.

I really like Grant because he reminds me of a guy I used to fuck (er, I mean date) back in my twenties (hi Pete!). Aw, memories...
title: Grant
